content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I'm looking to rent it out for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, the apartment is nice and newly built. I am a reliable and responsible student. I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I see that the apartment is in the city center and close to important facilities. I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a higher price. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that you want a higher price. However, as a student, I have to consider my budget. I am willing to pay 450 Euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and facilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. However, I believe 480 Euros per month is a reasonable price for the apartment. This price is higher than my initial offer, but it is still within my budget. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [480] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
